definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons
pinyin: Bu4 Kuo4 san4 He2 wu3 qi4 Tiao2 yue1

definition: to let everyone know/spread the word!

sentences.english: So, that is how we got the diffusion equation.
sentences.chinese: 这就是得到扩散方程的过程。

sentences.english: It is to be assumed that the information was then passed on to the AQ Khan nuclear proliferation network.
sentences.chinese: 它是假定该资料，然后转嫁到卡迪尔汗的核扩散网络。

sentences.english: In an information-based world, power diffusion may pose a bigger danger than power transition.
sentences.chinese: 在信息化世界，权力扩散比权力转移更危险。

sentences.english: The numerical method for the inverse problem of second-dimensional advection-dispersion-reaction equations is discussed in the article.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了一类二维对流反应扩散方程反问题的数值解法。

sentences.english: A model for the removal of multiplicative noises was proposed based on the non-local diffusion method.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于非局部扩散的去除乘性噪声的模型。

sentences.english: The release rate of the prepared cream base was investigated by diffusion method.
sentences.chinese: 采用扩散法考察所制乳膏释放度。

sentences.english: Double diffusive convection during static crystallization was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了静态定向结晶过程中的双扩散对流现象。

sentences.english: We suspect conditions were perfect for the virus to spread.
sentences.chinese: 我们怀疑这个环境对于病毒扩散来说是完美的。

sentences.english: The results show that improved hole is more advantageous to the radial mixing of gas stream.
sentences.chinese: 对比结果表明，桥孔比圆孔更有利气流的径向扩散。

sentences.english: Moving of oncomelania with dam-break flood is the main cause for spreading schistosomiasis.
sentences.chinese: 采用模型实验对钉螺随溃堤洪水扩散规律进行了研究。

sentences.english: Carbon nanotubes synthesis using diffusion flame is a kind of novel technique.
sentences.chinese: 利用扩散火焰合成碳纳米管是一项新的技术和方法。

sentences.english: Diffusion characteristics of copper in lamellar and columnar nickel deposit are also determined.
sentences.chinese: 并分析了铜在柱状和块状镍镀层中的扩散系数。

sentences.english: The most typical is the so-called "nursery rhyme", that children can recite the proliferation of those who pass.
sentences.chinese: 最典型的是所谓“童谣”，即儿童也能诵传扩散者。

sentences.english: Now an invisible pollution is beginning to spread.
sentences.chinese: 现在一种无形的污染正开始扩散。

sentences.english: The policy emphasizes the prevention of nuclear proliferation and nuclear terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 该政策强调防止核扩散及防范核恐怖主义。

sentences.english: As they work to stop the plague from spreading, Tarrou and Dr. Rieux become good friends.
sentences.chinese: 塔鲁和李欧医生也在合力阻止瘟疫扩散中结为好友。

definition: to shift/to divert or distract (attention etc)/to change/to transform/metastasis (medicine)/to evacuate (people)
(lit. and fig.) to permeate/to seep into/(of a product, idea etc) to penetrate (in a population)/(of hostile forces) to infiltrate/(chemistry) osmosis
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]
to make (military) incursions/to invade/to intrude into/to trespass/to gain unauthorized access (computing)
expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
